main event: A civilian observed a UFO resembling a balloon on 12 December 1957 in Westchester, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a good-sized balloon,The shape of the object was noted as bowl-shaped on top and bottom,The sighting lasted for approximately 1.5 minutes,The object was observed traveling straight before flying out of sight,Conclusions of the investigation suggested the object was a balloon.
